definition: the act of securing possession of the rebounding basketball after a missed shot, return to a former condition
details:
noun
- the act of securing possession of the rebounding basketball after a missed shot
- a reaction to a crisis or setback or frustration
= example: a reaction to a crisis or setback or frustration
- a movement back from an impact
= synonyms: backlash, recoil, repercussion
verb
- return to a former condition
= synonyms: rally
- spring back
= synonyms: spring
